The Problem in India's Rental Market

A ₹5,000+ Cr market growing 25% YoY, yet plagued by inefficiencies.

₹

High Broker Costs

Operators bleed ₹30-60K per tenant in commissions, killing margins.

Lost Leads

Over 60% of potential tenants are lost due to delayed responses and follow-ups.

No Intelligence

Zero data ownership means no insights into pricing power or tenant preferences.
